name: Polymarket
fullText: “Polls are based on the idea that history is a good guide to the future… there are occasions when (polymarkets) perform better than statistical models, especially when history is not a good guide to the future” — CNN https://t.co/cAzB0c9vYZ

name: HashKey Group
fullText:
Bitcoin’s recent price volatility reflects shifting global liquidity conditions amid turbulence in Japan’s bond market.

Tim Sun @TiezhuCrypto, Senior Researcher at HashKey, highlights that the Bank of Japan’s policy response will be a key factor shaping global funding conditions

name: Polymarket
fullText: BREAKING: Trump suggests invoking NATO Article 5 to make other countries patrol the U.S. southern border from “invaders” — freeing up border patrol agents for other tasks.

name: Elon Musk
fullText: For quality of life, it is better to err on the side of being an optimist and wrong, rather than a pessimist and right
